catalog-text: Find the right packaging for your needs:
contact-text: Do you have questions about our products or are you interested in tailored packaging solutions? Simply send us a message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
dropshipping-main-text-1: Our dropshipping service offers you the possibility to deliver directly to your customers in your name from a packaging unit onwards - at no additional cost! With over 700 products, you can expand your range without inventory or capital commitment. Order only when your customers order, and we'll take care of the delivery on your behalf.
dropshipping-main-text-2: This efficient distribution channel shortens transportation routes, reduces logistics, and storage costs. Our solution enables fully automated order processing, easily via EDI in XML format.
dropshipping-benefit-text-3: Order from one packaging unit onwards
products-packaging-text: The innovative shipping packaging from BSL Packaging saves time with a self-adhesive tear-open thread closure, offers secure closure methods, and facilitates work through customizable cardboard heights and flash bottoms.
